start.text: You don't look as if you have any trouble killing things.
Shouldn't we try to capture a specimen?
I just want to get out of this alive.
I certainly hope you know what you're doing.
Oh no, you're one of the... them. Can't we just get along?

start_boss.text: Those things, they're everywhere! We've got to get out of here!

retreat.text: I've got to get out of here!
A failure of this magnitude is extremely improbable.

out_of_missiles.text: Well, there goes our grant money.

need_help.text: No... No! No! Get it off me! Get it off! Get it off!
Don't shoot! I'm with the science team!
Surely someone will come and rescue us.

pursuing.text: Well, i think it's rather stimulating, don't you?
Fat lot of good that PhD does me now.

running.text: This is madness! I'm getting out of here!

hull_90.text: I seem to be wounded...but I can keep going.
This is all within theoretical limits.
I hope those containment parameters are still nominal.

hull_50.text: Do you recall any of those emergency survival procedures?
It can't get any worse than this.

hull_30.text: I don't think I can last much longer.

overload.text: Quick! It's about to go critical!

death.text: No, I don't want to die!

victory.text: With my brains and your brawn we'll make an excellent team.
I believe this will make for a notable paper, don't you?
I predicted all of this, you know. All of it!
